Name: Shooty Skies
About the game: Dodge the bullets, shoot the enemies, defeat the bosses! Take to the skies for an endless-arcade shooter that is fast, furious and formidable! Collect over 200 daring pilots over 20 different terrains. Change the intensity from Scouty to Screamy, if you dare! Earn a multitude of achievements Challenging daily missions Guns! Missiles! Badgers! Get flying now!
